desc: 味方単体の麻痺を治療する

dictionary.lore: A potion made from Bara Nuts fermented in Blue Drops, it heals temporary paralysis. Synthesis for the recovery of status effects such as this is often simple to learn, however the Stimulant is relatively difficult. This is because if the synthesis ratios are mistaken it creates a liquid liable to cause fainting.

name: 気付け薬
